conversation.message:
Dear Student_E,

Thank you for your continued interest in School_D and for your thoughtful question. At this stage, decisions are driven primarily by our admissions priorities and available capacity.

If you would like to ensure your file is fully up to date should we be able to reconsider candidates, the most helpful items are:
- Your most recent grades/transcript (and any new exam results)
- A brief update on recent activities/leadership or notable commitments
- A short statement (a few sentences is fine) connecting specific School_D programs/expectations to what you would contribute

We appreciate your clear willingness to commit if offered a place. While we cannot promise an opening, you are welcome to send any updates, and if you decide to submit another formal application, we will review it in line with our priorities and remaining capacity.

Sincerely,
School_D Admissions
